author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: “Saparikkamano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano.
segments.en: “Mendicants, this teaching provides a bypass, it doesn’t lack a bypass.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano?
segments.en: And how does this teaching provide a bypass, not lacking a bypass?

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātissa, bhikkhave, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
segments.en: Not killing living creatures bypasses killing living creatures.

segments.pli: Adinnādāyissa, bhikkhave, adinnādānā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
Kāmesumicchācārissa, bhikkhave, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
segments.en: Avoiding sexual misconduct bypasses sexual misconduct.

segments.pli: Musāvādissa, bhikkhave, musāvādā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
Pisuṇavācassa, bhikkhave, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
segments.en: Avoiding divisive speech bypasses divisive speech.

segments.pli: Pharusavācassa, bhikkhave, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
segments.en: Avoiding harsh speech bypasses harsh speech.

segments.pli: Samphappalāpissa, bhikkhave, samphappalāpā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
segments.en: Avoiding talking nonsense bypasses talking nonsense.

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano”ti.
segments.en: That’s how this teaching provides a bypass, it doesn’t lack a bypass.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, this teaching provides a bypass, it doesn’t lack…

suttaplex.blurb: Through the teaching one may avoid the various kinds of bad deeds.
